summary: you are a monk. no, not the preaching kind...
descriptionHtml:
you start at level one.

you are locked in a cage, with the body of your master laying on a pile of hay in the corner. they cage is locked, and the guard outside has made a discovery, three hungry wolves. 

You are a Crimson monk, just as your master once was. Your job is not to travel the land and teach the words of a greater being, oh no. as a Crimson Monk, you do not follow deities, instead you follow a life of balance. You keep the good balanced with the evil, you ensure the dragons don\'t overwhelm the towns. Then again, the past few days in this cage have gotten you thinking...


feel free to edit name/race with showracemenu.
author: TheSingedAlchemist
